title: Principal’s Conclave of Government Polytechnics
description:
Recognition at MCR HRD Institute
November 1, 2025 | MCR HRD Institute, Hyderabad
The FEEDX Polytechnic Community had the honor of presenting FX BOT (Pilot Version of
the FEEDX Project) at the Principal’s Conclave of Government Polytechnics, held at the
MCR HRD Institute.
The presentation took place in the esteemed presence of Dr. Yogita Rana, IAS and Smt. A. Sri
Devasena, IAS, Commissioner of Collegiate & Technical Education, marking a significant
milestone for the Government Institute of Electronics, Secunderabad, and the FEEDX
initiative.
The conclave witnessed the participation of Principals from all 59 Government Polytechnic
Colleges across Telangana. A proud highlight of the event was the special recognition given
to the FX BOT project, acknowledging its relevance, impact, and potential in strengthening
transparency and student feedback systems.
During her address, Smt. A. Sri Devasena, IAS, spoke about the FEEDX initiative and FX BOT
as part of her speech, referencing the project in front of all attending principals — a moment of
strong validation for student-led innovation within the technical education system.
This recognition further strengthens our commitment to building impact-driven,
student-centric solutions and marks another important step forward in the FEEDX journey.
